title: The Good Morrow paraphrase of argument

content.prompt: Which of the following best paraphrases the speaker’s argument in lines 10-11 ?

choices.label: Lovers see a beauty in one another that seems sufficient to fill the world.
Love needs to be restrained so that one person’s identity is not lost in the other’s.
Love can be all-consuming and make lovers seem foolish.
Love for the beloved expands into a greater love for humanity.

skill.text: Skill 5.B: Explain the function of specific words and phrases in a text.
